Text.Page:
Got a simple mission for you, .

Eliminate the Heavens Fall cultists battling our garrison at the mouth of Paraanon Ravine.

Focus on the {@LinkCreature:17#300442#Heavens Fall guards}, {@LinkCreature:17#300552#barrelhead threshers} and {@linkcreature:17#301220#mutated elins}.

Report to Blaessa at the Embattled Outpost when your mission is complete.
Thanks to you, the cultists won't be troubling us anytime soon.
It doesn't look like you've completed your mission.
